name: Genuine Parts Company
description: Genuine Parts Company (GPC) is a leading distributor of automotive and industrial replacement parts, founded in 1928. With over 90 years of experience, the company operates through a network of more than 3,000 locations across North America, Europe, and Asia. GPC serves a diverse customer base, including automotive repair shops, industrial manufacturers, and consumers. The company's extensive product line includes automotive parts, tools, equipment, and industrial components, ensuring that it meets the needs of both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. GPC is dedicated to providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service, making it a trusted partner in the automotive and industrial sectors. The company focuses on innovation and efficiency, utilizing technology to enhance its distribution processes and improve inventory management. Genuine Parts Company also emphasizes sustainability, aiming to reduce its environmental impact through responsible sourcing and waste management practices. As a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange, GPC remains committed to delivering value to its shareholders while maintaining its reputation as an industry leader.

seo.meta_title: Genuine Parts Company | Automotive and Industrial Parts Distributor
seo.meta_description: Genuine Parts Company (GPC) is a leader in automotive and industrial replacement parts distribution, serving customers globally with a commitment to quality and service.

faq.question: What does Genuine Parts Company do?
faq.answer: Genuine Parts Company distributes automotive and industrial replacement parts globally.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Genuine Parts Company?
faq.answer: Paul Donahue is the CEO of Genuine Parts Company.

faq.question: Where is Genuine Parts Company headquartered?
faq.answer: Genuine Parts Company is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does GPC offer?
faq.answer: GPC offers automotive parts, tools, equipment, and industrial components.

faq.question: When was Genuine Parts Company founded?
faq.answer: Genuine Parts Company was founded in 1928.
